name: BlueFish Web Designs
tagline: Websites for Professionals & Small Business Owners
description:
BlueFish Web Designs we have been providing affordable, professional website design and maintenance since 1999. 
Our clients include businesses, professionals, corporations, and non-profit organizations. 
Our websites have features like e-Commerce shopping carts, SEO design, and database driven pages that can be managed by a non-technical owner. We offer small business counseling on best internet practices, search engine optimization, website re-design and programming, and website maintenance.
